attributes.action: Disregard the Early Day Motion by Keith Vaz regarding the propasal for the erection of a statue to Gandhi in Leicester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We,the undersigned,ask the Prime Minister to disregard the Early Day Motion tabled by Keith Vaz with regard to the ongoing campaign he supports to erect a 7 to 9ft tall statue of Gandhi in the city of Leicester(Belgrave district) and any other area of the city.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Disregard the Early Day Motion by Keith Vaz regarding the propasal for the erection of a statue to Gandhi in Leicester."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17881


Prime Minister's Office
